gameFiles

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameFiles.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The player class hold information on the two players. It holds information on which side the player is, and the cards in there hand. There will only ever be two players.
    Author:
    Mark Wolgin, Josh Davis

    • Field Detail

      • hand

        private java.util.ArrayList<Card> hand
        ArrayList of Card holding the cards available to the player on their turn. Has both scoring cards and turn cards.

      • side

        private Side side
        This is the ENUM Side identifier

      • milOps

        private int milOps
        The player's current number of military operations

    • Method Detail

      • playCard

        public int playCard(Card card)
        Play a card from the hand
        Parameters:
        card - the Card to play
        Returns:
        0 for enemy's card, 1 for own or UNK card, -1 for Scoring card

      • dealCards

        public void dealCards(int turn)
        Deals cards to the player as determined by the turn
        Parameters:
        turn - the current turn

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard(int index)
        Take a card from the deck. If index is less than 0, takes a random card. Currently uses hand instead of deck. Card is also added to the hand.
        Parameters:
        index - Card Index
        Returns:
        the card taken out of the deck

        Parameters:

        ui - UICore object to use for input

                        UICore ui,

        Rolls a coup by the args given
        Parameters:

        ui - The UI in use
        defcon - The current defcon
        Returns:
